page.title: 19GAMES THAT WE PLAY.
page.content: These are games we play in our{school {yard}at playtime. They have been put in an{order of popularity. } {FOOTBALL} Two teams kick a ball to see who scores the most goals. {BALL GAMES}Usually throwing and catching. {DICKY LEVO}There are two teams try to catch each other. {CRICKET}There is a bowler a batsman and the rest field. {HOPSCOTCH}You throw a stone on a marked out pitch and have to jump in and out of squares. {HIDE AND SEEK}Everyone hides except one person who has to seek them out. In the evenings most of us like to {play out.}We play some of these games at home after school, but we generally like to watch {television}especially children's I.T.V..
